name: Moon Runner (ONIGAME)
description:
Run for your life! Escape the menacing giant drill machine!

Join our moon expedition and help us avoid an inevitable peril from a drill malfunction. Run from the drill as fast as you can, dodging obstacles and collecting bonuses along the way.

Features:

★ Run and jump through moon caverns
★ Collect coins and unlock new items
★ Multiple characters to choose from
★ Cool 16-bit retro graphics
★ Awesome Synth-wave soundtrack
★ More features with every update

Credits:

Game Design: Victor Savcenco
Programming: Victor Savcenco
Marketing: Saagar Patel

Artwork: MattWalkden, MattWalkden
